heroSection.title: Unlock Deeper Intimacy with Your Partner
heroSection.subtitle: Discover personalized insights and activities to strengthen your relationship and enhance your love life.

step1.title: Answer Questions Together
step1.description: Both you and your partner complete a fun, intimate survey.

step2.title: AI-Powered Analysis
step2.description: Our Secret AI analyzes your combined responses.

step3.title: Receive Personalized Insights
step3.description: Get a custom report with tailored activities and suggestions.

researchSection.title: Backed by Science
researchSection.description: Our approach is based on extensive research in relationship psychology and intimacy.

reportSection.title: What You'll Discover
reportSection.description1: Uncover your common passions and fantasies.
reportSection.description2: Identify unspoken desires and areas for growth.
reportSection.description3: Get practical tips to spice up your love life.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.answer1: This platform is designed to help couples improve their intimacy and communication through personalized insights and activities.
faqPage.answer2: You and your partner will each answer a series of questions about your relationship, preferences, and desires. Our AI then analyzes your responses to provide tailored recommendations.
faqPage.answer3: Yes, we take your privacy very seriously. All data is encrypted and anonymized to ensure your information remains confidential.
faqPage.question4: What kind of activities will be suggested?
faqPage.answer4: The activities are tailored to your specific needs and preferences, and may include communication exercises, date night ideas, and intimacy-building techniques.
faqPage.question5: How long does it take to complete the survey?
faqPage.answer5: The survey typically takes about 20-30 minutes to complete for each partner.
faqPage.question6: Can I use this platform if I'm not in a traditional relationship?
faqPage.answer6: Yes, our platform is designed to be inclusive and can be used by couples of all types, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, or relationship structure.

securityPage.title: Security and Privacy
securityPage.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your data and ensuring your privacy.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access.

uniqueTokens.title: Unique Tokens
uniqueTokens.description: We use unique tokens to ensure that only you and your partner can access your survey results.
uniqueTokens.point1: Each survey is assigned a unique token
uniqueTokens.point2: Tokens are securely stored and managed
uniqueTokens.point3: Access to survey results requires a valid token

dataSecuritySummary.title: How We Protect Your Data
dataSecuritySummary.description: We take data security seriously and implement various measures to protect your information.

whatData.title: What Data We Collect
whatData.description: We collect data about your relationship, preferences, and desires to provide personalized insights and activities.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Data
howWeUse.description: We use your data to analyze your relationship dynamics and provide tailored recommendations.
howWeUse.point3: Improvement of our platform and services

weDoNotShare.title: We Do Not Share Your Data
weDoNotShare.description: We do not share your data with third parties without your explicit consent.

transmissionSecurity.title: Transmission Security
transmissionSecurity.description: We use secure transmission protocols to protect your data during transmission.

anonymity.title: Anonymity
anonymity.description: Your responses are anonymized to protect your privacy.

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted to prevent unauthorized access.

reporting.title: Reporting
reporting.description: We provide detailed reports on your relationship dynamics.

whatIs.title: What is Secret AI?
whatIs.description: Advanced artificial intelligence designed specifically for couples
whatIs.paragraph1: Secret AI is our proprietary technology based on advanced artificial intelligence models, created specifically to analyze and understand relationship dynamics, sexual preferences, sexual satisfaction, and health.
whatIs.paragraph2: Unlike general AI models, ours has been specifically trained based on:
whatIs.listItem1: Psychological research on closeness and intimacy
whatIs.listItem2: Research in sexology, sociology, and neurobiology
whatIs.listItem3: Consultations with sexologists and couple therapists
whatIs.listItem4: Anonymous data on preferences and desires in relationships

security.title: Security
security.description: Secret AI treats your privacy as an absolute priority. All data is processed with the highest security standards:
security.point3: No storage of sensitive data after report generation

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.description: Secret AI analyzes the responses of both partners, identifying areas of agreement, divergence, and potential for exploration:
howItWorks.step4: Takes into account the boundaries and limits of each partner

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.description: Secret AI adapts to the unique character of each relationship:
personalization.point1: Creates personalized reports based on your answers
personalization.point2: Takes into account the comfort level and experience of both partners
personalization.point3: Suggests activities tailored to your level of play

communication.title: Empathetic communication
communication.description: Secret AI has been designed to communicate in an empathetic and sensitive way:
communication.point1: Uses language full of respect and acceptance
communication.point3: Helps build open communication between partners

cta.title: Ready to discover a new dimension of intimacy?
cta.button: Fill out the survey with Secret AI
